tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: When errors happen due to definitions in the trading system, that is where you will find the corresponding error messages!

paragraphs.text: The Trading System Errors layer interacts with the design space so that you may track and find error messages. Messages are tied to the node responsible for producing the error!
Place the mouse pointer over one of the error bullets in the charting space and use the design space map to find the source of the red circle.
